website_summaries.verdict: A dual-layer mattress with good initial support that may need to be replaced within three years.
pros: A medium-firm mattress at a bargain price, this all-foam product offers good support for stomach sleepers
Inflates quickly, in about an hour, and has little residual chemical odor
Includes a fabric cover and a memory foam pillow

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty good -- UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: It arrived within 2 days and comes with a 'free' pillow. Was relatively easy to take out of the box. The mattress 'inflated' within 20 minutes, which surprised me -- I was prepared to wait a day or two before being able to sleep on it. Is pretty firm right out the box but I have a feeling it will break in. Will update at 6mths or so. UPDATE- It has now been about 8 months and it is still very comfortable. I have not noticed any sinkage or anything like that. Very happy with my purchase, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: Very well worth the money!..I'd like to suggest that you consider the thickness before hitting that order button tho. We ordered a 12 inch because we wanted sheets to fit snug and it's a bit of a challenge to get in. Our bed sits on a plywood platform and our old mattress was just the right height but this one is much higher but much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David Clay Funk

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: 4/25/18 I received the mattress yesterday. The box looked slightly banged up, but not bad... Not punctured. After unboxing, I rolled it out and broke the seal. Within two hours, the mattress was fully expanded to the full 12". Nice! My initial impression laying on it: softer than what I imagined "medium-firm" to be. However, after sleeping on it the first night, medium-firm is accurate. It is SUPER comfortable! I'm really happy with it. I will update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Herbie W.

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this mattress! It is our first memory foam mattress and it is the best mattress we have ever slept on. It is soft and comfortable, yet firm and supportive. We have never slept better. We waited 48 hours to use it and it was fully expanded and there was no odor. I would definitely buy this mattress again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Rose

customer_reviews.title: I liked the price the most
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price the most. The least thing i like it’s too soft . I ordered medium firm and it’s way too soft . I have herniated discs and this is not working ... if you’re looking to sleep on a great soft comfy cloud this is for you .
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Weigh all your options before you buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy an difficult to put sheets on. Edges soft so you tend to slide off the bed when getting into it!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: WE ALL love it. it is comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this mattress for my daughter, it took 2 days to expand completely. She loves it, WE ALL love it. it is comfortable and soft. I certainly will recommend this product to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: this mattress is really like not sleeping on anything but a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Talk about comfort, this mattress is really like not sleeping on anything but a cloud. Its cool, hasn't built up heat like regular matresses do. I'm heavy so I expected it to squash out on the sides, but it hasn't yet. Also I put it on an adjustable bed out any issues happening. I didn't see anything on not doing it. So far no problems. I also put an XL twin mattress pad on it to keep it clean. It comings with a mattress pad on it. I'd recommend XL sheets if you are going to use a adjustable bed so ther room to set it up and down. I have really enjoyed sleeping on this matterss.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Moved to a King bed and needed a new mattress. We had a queen with a foam mattress that we really liked, so I wanted something similar. This mattress feels like a cloud when you get onto it. It’s amazing. also, you can’t feel the other person move, motion transfer is negligible. I have it in Florida, it is not hot, sleeps nice and cool. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Don't read bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: We now have every size memory foam mattress. Just switched from queen to king "because my husband calls me a bed hog". Wow!! We love this bed. I am so glad to be a bed hog! Great great mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bang for the Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this L&S Classic for our spare guest bedroom and did a personal "sleep test" on it myself. Can't expect your guests to like it if you don't! :-) It was comfortable and not hot with a light topper protector added. This mattress is very good quality and the price point makes it very affordable. It's medium firm but not like sleeping on a board. The included free pillow is top quality as well. Edges are stable when you sit on them. All in all a good product and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Eliminates the need to turn on to the other side to relieve shoulder pressure so more restful sleep. Combined it with a metal support so no box spring needed. I got the twin and it is HEAVY so as the instructions say open the wrapping where you are going to use it! No "new bed" smell noted and it went full size right away. The enclosed pillow had a smell to it but that dissipated in less than a day.
customer_reviews.author: Gunny 48

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bed for 3 months and so far it has been exactly what I wanted. It’s pretty firm, but still has a good bit of softness. I have been loving it. Will try to update every 3 or so months to see if anything changes. Update: I said I would update in 3 months, it has now bee 8. I still love this bed. Its still holding up. My only complaint is that my 12lb pup thinks he needs about 9/10 of the bed to sprawl out on. Other than that, we are super happy!!
customer_reviews.author: braden

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was my second mattress from Live and Sleep! Our first one was an RV queen for our RV. We loved it. Sold the RV and our new one has a king bed. After receiving we measured the platform in the new RV and this would not fit. We needed a king narrow. Unfortunately Live and Sleep doesn’t carry a king narrow so we had to return it. We had not unboxed it thank goodness. Easy return. So sad because we loved our queen mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reader

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this for a little over 1 year now
customer_reviews.text: Is mattress was a little softer than I originally thought it would be, but that being said I've have recently slept on a firm memory foam mattresses and decided I like this one better. I am 6'4 200 lbs an havent had any issue with it. The only thing is every couple of months I rotate the bed so that I dont wear out one side faster than the other. Not a big deal considering the price of the mattress and plus it's fairly light an not a big issue for me. I use on a platform frame with no box underneath and havent had dig marks from the side slats.
customer_reviews.author: sajenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress. We could not be more pleased. There was no chemical odor and it expanded quickly into a big, extremely comfortable mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Quickly looses firmness
customer_reviews.text: When we first put it on our bed, it took a few days to "inflate" and I hoped it would fill up more firmly then it ever did. The edges have been soft the whole time. We sweat our faces off all night in a way we've never sweat before and we spend the whole night waking up and scooting closer into the middle so that we don't roll off the saggy sides. So disappointed we wasted our money on this sucker.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Just received the mattress today. It's very soft, softer than the description would have you believe. At first I thought it didn't even get close to 12" thickness but after a full day it did expand to about 11.5". Again, very soft. We slept on it overnight and found it two soft. We're pretty heavy and maybe this would be nice for a skinny person. It would be fair to mention that the price is excellent for any mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Flaxman

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. I'm 70 and my wife is 63, we managed to get the box with the bed in it in the house, and then into our bedroom without too much hassle. The box was heavy (over 70 pounds) but we did it. I read in other reviews that the mattress didn't expand out after several days. Ours was completely finished expanding in less than an hour. It does still have a 'chemical' smell but I expect that will dissipate in a day or so. We will have to see how it is to actually sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Pathfinder306

customer_reviews.title: I have slept like a baby for the last week and havent woke ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for a little over a week now. I have back issues stemming from an L5 S1 bulging disc a couple years ago. I have slept like a baby for the last week and havent woke up with my hips and back hurting as much. Sti too early to tell but I dont see the mattress sagging or losing contour anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Beats our $1200 mattress
customer_reviews.text: We owned a $1200 mattress and had to return it because it did not work for us. This value mattress works for us a 100%. We wake up well-rested and without any discomfort in the lower back. I do understand what the other reviews are saying about it being softer than what they expected but that’s what makes it so cozy. Even though it is a little plush, it has excellent support. This is a perfectly engineered mattress. The great value is just a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Sorus

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this mattress to friends and family
customer_reviews.text: Mattress exceeded our expectations and expanded fully within 24 hours. Pillow was an unexpected surprise and will order three more. Company sent out information via email prior to us receiving the mattress which was helpful on opening the mattress and explained what to expect from the mattress. Would definitely recommend this mattress to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Still a little too early to say how comfortable it is
customer_reviews.text: Still a little too early to say how comfortable it is. One issue we had was that when we unboxed the mattress and took it out of the plastic, the top had dirt/dust streaks all over it. Wasn't pleased but couldn't imagine getting it back in the box and sending back.
customer_reviews.author: P. Curran

customer_reviews.title: If you want to hurt this mattress is for you!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress in June 2019. It is described as medium-firm. This mattress is extremely soft and if you don’t have back pain now you will after sleeping on this mattress. I really wanted to like it but just can’t tolerate getting up in the morning and can’t stand up straight because of pain and stiffness. Of course after having it 5 months the company doesn’t care even though the description states to give the mattress time and it firms up. Ours did not.
customer_reviews.author: SKG

customer_reviews.title: Great bed-in-a-box
customer_reviews.text: Got this mattress in a king to replace a 10-15 year old Tempurpedic that had me waking up everyday with a backache...also got it at an amazing price on Prime day, but would have paid more...opened up fully and quickly, no odor, just the right amount of firmness with a kind of plush feel (like sleeping on firm marshmallows!) We've only had it a week or so, so can't speak to the longevity, but can't beat the price regardless. It's cooler than our old tempurpedic, and I don't wake up sweaty (yet)...I put a thin 'cooling' mattress protector on it as well. So far very happy with this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Fricano

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong item/but very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item back in February for my camper. 3/18/19 was the soonest I could get into my camper to open this mattress. However received the wrong size. The label on the box and my order said short queen. When we opened it up it’s a regular queen because it hangs over by 5 inches and now i can’t walk around the camper bed. Bought bedding and mattress pad for a short queen. However the Mattress is very comfortable and glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: hwinder

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mattress for a year now in my Hunting camp RV. It is so comfortable, and so perfectly firm, that I’d love to get one for my regular bed at home (which was about 20 times more expensive). I highly recommend this mattress. I just had a three level fusion, and slept on the bed last night for the first time. My surgery was a month ago. I could not believe how well I slept.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this one and loved it so much we bought more for the guest rooms. No odor at all, the firmness seems just right. My husband comments almost every day how much he likes it. Do not hesitate to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: No regrets!! I was originally skeptical about making a mattress purchase online, however, after my experience with this mattress ...I am very happy that I took the chance. I purchased it in 2019 and felt it necessary to wait until now before posting a review. I chose to write this simply because I relied on others reviews to help me make my decision to purchase.I am in love with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Estruch

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Point Item
customer_reviews.text: 1st foam mattress purchase. Simple packaging and clear instructions. A little firm so far after a few nights but expect to soften over time. Free pillow was a nice bonus. Was not expecting luxury item. Price point is right to keep for a few years then move to spare room. Hopefully it's not too comfy so guests don't stick around more than a night or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Bale

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable mattress!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a day late It took a bit to set up as we were putting it into the frame of what was a Water Bed. It is comfortable and my husband and I have both slept well from the first night. It was a good buy, did not smell at all and was delivered right to the door. I love the delivery aspect saves so much hassle and expense!
customer_reviews.author: Karman G. Trull

customer_reviews.title: No asymmetrical edges
customer_reviews.text: Got a king mattress and it’s great over all, this our second one, we have one in the guess room and so far so good. The only downside is the corner aren’t exactly perfectly designed so if you have OCD like me it’s going to bother you as the edges aren’t asymmetric.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed :(
customer_reviews.text: I did read the reviews, most were very favorable so I went ahead and bought this, Love the length for the short queen, fit in my RV perfect...very disappointed with the mattress, its like sleeping in a donut hole, sink in the middle, and very hard to get out. I would not recommend to anyone. I have purchased two memory foam mattress from Amazon before and loved them, but not this one! Would give the one star just for the Short Queen size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was very spectacle at first but now I love love love this bed it is not so so soft and it's mid firm just perfect for my back.....
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: This is so comfy, I missed my appointment napping!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my RV, as I will be going full time nomad in July. I am in the process of doing renovations before hitting the road. I decided to take a “nap”, which I slept so well, I over slept and missed an appointment. Needless to say, it’s comfy! I will not be missing my king size memory foam mattress, this is just as good!
customer_reviews.author: Authenticate First

customer_reviews.title: Already love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered this morning and my girls helped me carry it to the RV. We took off the plastic, unrolled it and it instantly puffed right up. We were pleasantly surprised that there was no weird smell.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE GIOVANNI

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had this mattress for about a week. I was a little concerned how soft it was for my husband since he’s had 2 back operations. But we absolutely love this mattress!!! It is soft but when you sleep on it it snugs your body and it is the best night sleep. The pillow that came with it is just as amazing!!! I wish I could order another one just like it !!! I would definitely recommend this mattress for comfort and the best sleep you will have !! 👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H

customer_reviews.title: Best Putty Bed I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 twin xls and a adjustable frames. These are the best putty beds I've ever had. They are on the softer side, but saying that still awesome beds! I would do itagin in a second...enjoy....
customer_reviews.author: Desert Living

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 mattress's in the last 2 years because I couldn't find one comfortable enough for my back. I love this mattress! It came fast and was very easy to set up. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Received mattress for short queen RV. It was the wrong size in box. Notified Amazon and the company shipped another and it fit very well. Nice mattress and pillow. Appreciate the prompt service and product is very nice and comfortable. I am a senior a few problems and this mattress took care of sleeping in my RV. Would recommend it. Time to go camping again.
customer_reviews.author: Danny W Woods

customer_reviews.title: No buyer's remorse here !
customer_reviews.text: Never ever did I think I would purchase a mattress online. I am EVER so glad I did. The box it arrived in was manageable with 2 flights of stairs - just rolled the box up end over end- as I am a single woman. The instructions were VERY simple. I reluctantly followed the suggestion & gave it a full 24 hrs 'to set itself up' & fully inflate until I slept in it. It also warned of a possible 'initial smell', but I did not experience that. Im glad I waited because it beatifully encased me throughout the entire night of slumber!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: WHO DOESN'T LOVE COMFORT?
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to find a mattress that suits all of my needs. Just add this 12" memory foam and you are in heaven. The pain just seems to melt away. Relaxation and sleep just overcome you.
customer_reviews.author: Lovette Caples

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: My first matress was for my RV, the second matress was a gift! Just received a call from the recipient, who just had the best rest in along time, wanting information to buy one for their guest room. This matress is excellent and keeps its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Very comftable .
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for the or I've. This is my second one I've purchases. After my first fine (queen) I really lived it so iourchased a king size for the master bed. It should come with a free pullow which I didn't get
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was one of the best purchases I’ve ever made in my life. My sleep pattern has improved 100%. It was awesome that I was able to have it shipped directly to me and set up was a piece of cake
customer_reviews.author: King Salmon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: My sister purchased this mattress initially and kept raving about how comfortable it was. I decided to purchase one as well and I’m so happy I did. It’s not as firm as other memory foam mattresses but I prefer that! I love how I slightly sink into the mattress, making me feel like I’m sleeping on a cloud. It’s also 12 inches in height as promised. The free pillow that came with it is equaly as soft and is the best pillow I’ve purchased in years. I would definitely recommend because the quality is excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you will love it
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these. I have them in all my bedrooms and in motorhome. I enjoy the fact that are not to pricey. I had to replace mine after 4 years breaks down to $7.47 Per month.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy D.

customer_reviews.title: Enveloped in supportive foam
customer_reviews.text: Old firm mattress caused hip/back pain, extra chiropractic visits. Wow! New Live & Sleep Classic is such a supportive but soft space in which to stretch out! Back felt gr8 after 1st night. I love how it envelopes you with full support in many more positions, such as half-way onto your side. Sleep on💤😎👍
customer_reviews.author: Stop

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer! Totally getting another one!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived faster than I thought! What a nice surprise! It was huge! I thought a Twin XL would be big kid bed, but it fit my teenage son just perfect! Soft, but great support and the extra pillow surprise was the icing on the cake! Coming back for a another one soon for the other kid.
customer_reviews.author: Irene J.

customer_reviews.title: So far.... GREAT
customer_reviews.text: After a month of sleeping on this i have to say it is Wonderful. Time will tell how well it holds up.... So far this is GREAT
customer_reviews.author: William Clune

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed 2 years ago and i'm already looking for a new bed to purchase. The bed is too soft and when I emailed the company about it they informed me that the bed should firm up - 2 years later it has done the opposite and has softened. There are indents in the bed where we sleep and I have to flip and rotate the bed often (every month). Frequent visits to the chiropractor and painful mornings. Go look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I thought the mattress was too soft and was disappointed at first. It turned out it just took a few days for my body to adjust to it from previous non-memory foam mattress, and now I think it is true medium firm. I sleep well either on my back or side. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: The BEST sleep EVER
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought we had received the wrong delivery, because the box was so small! Then we opened it and cut off the plastic and the mattress took on a life of its own, growing to the 12" deep short queen mattress we ordered. The first time we laid down on it, we were in heaven. The BEST sleep EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality mattress. My back problems are much better since I have been sleeping on this mattress. The only thing I would have liked is for it to be a little softer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was a definite improvement over the standard mattress that comes in an rv. Give plenty of support while being soft as well. Being a person that is 300+ lbs that was a concern of mine. No more aches and pains while sleeping. Didn't feel too hot while sleeping. Felt like the heat was able to dissipate. My wife and I are very happy with this selection.
customer_reviews.author: warren h morgan

customer_reviews.title: Just get this matress
customer_reviews.text: Got this on prime day so I got a good deal. I wanted a good matress but I didn't want to spend a grand on a high quality matress. Only slept on it twice so far but it was a great sleep and didn't notice any odor after a few hours. I have no complaints and it even came with an awesome pillow. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as more expensive bed in a boxes.
customer_reviews.text: I have a $700 bed in the box from another company. This one is just as good! For a cheap bed in the box, this mattress was surprisingly comfortable. My teenage daughter sleeps comfortablely on this bed—sometimes with two of her friends. Minimum side squish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have woke up every morning with pain in my back. This is the most uncomfortable mattress I have ever slept on. My husband also thinks it's uncomfortable. It takes me a good hour or 2 to be able to walk with out pain
customer_reviews.author: Toni M DeRocha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress, very affordable
customer_reviews.text: We love the mattress. First time buying and trying a memory foam style mattress. This one is perfect. Great price and it fully filled our cal king bed frame. Inflated to the full size in 24 hours but we left it alone for 48 hours to make sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Markley

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend but need to fix the rim.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Queens size bed and loved it. The king was super heavy to lift to put sheets on. It is super comfortable to sleep on. It is unstable to sit in the edge. You sip right down.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Colon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is a real mess. I regret buying it online which was my very 1st time and will be the last .oi wanted medium firm bed because of my back pain but this particular mattress is damm too soft and is shapless after 2night sleep
customer_reviews.author: may

customer_reviews.title: A little too soft
customer_reviews.text: The mattress came out of the box perfectly just as described. There was no foam odor. It is much better than the mattress I replaced. After reading so many reviews on so many mattresses, I was hoping this one was firmer than it is. It seems to get squishy during the night if I sleep in one place for a long period of time so I find myself rolling around looking for a place that is firmer. Now I know what "medium Firm" feels like since that is in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for senior adults with aches and pains
customer_reviews.text: We are senior adults and needed a lower mattress than what we had. This was due to my husband being in a rehab hospital and being very weak. We didn’t have the time to try out mattresses. Our sons family had purchased two for our grandchildren and they recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: geneva mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and you will sleep well :)
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing mattress! We have it in our guest room - and our friends and relatives rave about how comfortable it is and how well they sleep. This is an amazingly great value for the price! We highly recommend this product and seller! :)
customer_reviews.author: Professor Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: So Nice
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and soft. Great to sleep on. It is a little warmer than expected for a cool mattress so one less blanket is needed. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed and can't believe we got it at this price!
customer_reviews.text: We needed to furnish our guest room and i didn't want to go shopping. This bed and mattress are awesome! And at this price, you just can't beat this deal! Our youngest son came for a visit and was very happy with this bed. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Petrovich

customer_reviews.title: No support for the mattress and way too soft, pillow is nice
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is extremely soft and has no support. I’m 5’2” and 120lbs and I sink in to it down to the box spring. The pillow is nice though..
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: ... 2nd and 3rd purchases of these and my kids love them more than I liked mine
customer_reviews.text: These were my 2nd and 3rd purchases of these and my kids love them more than I liked mine.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ramos

customer_reviews.title: We found our perfect mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this bed for almost a year now and it's held its shape and has stayed comfortable for us. We enjoy our bed so much that we wish we could take it with us on vacations! It hugs in all the right places but it doesn't make you feel like you're getting sucked in. It has the right amount of firmness and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: very firm bed!
customer_reviews.text: My first night on this bed i slept like a baby, it is a pretty firm mattress and it didnt give off any chemical like smells when we took it out of its packaging. however even after weeks it still never inflated to 12 inches, has remained at 11 inches, which personally isnt a deal breaker for the good price and overall good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels like sleeping on a cloud. Pillow that came with works great for stomach sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Carney

customer_reviews.title: Queen sized not full
customer_reviews.text: Very decent mattress but the sizing is off. It came marked as a short queen which is what it is. It is far too wide for a full size frame or sheets.
customer_reviews.author: me537

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable bed ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought a king at first for myself. My son kept wanting to sleep in our room because our mattress was so comfy, so I bought the second one for him. We all love it and you cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McCann

customer_reviews.title: Softer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I chose this mattress after the rave reviews, hoping that it was the perfect mattress that I was looking for. Unfortunately, it is softer than expected and my husband hates that he sinks in. I will be working on exchanging it.
customer_reviews.author: casscass88

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Back doesn't ache when I get up in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Back doesn't ache when I get up in the morning. That's worth the price in itself.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Conway

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this mattress!! It has cured my back ache from my fairly new pillow top mattress. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Scottie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new mattress. I did have some shipping issues that delayed it's arrival but definitely worth the wait. i purchased the medium firmness and I was very nervous about how I would like a foam mattress. I was so pleasantly surprised at how comfortable it was. It doesn't feel flimsy (which was one of my biggest concerns being a non-foam person for so long). The set up was super easy and absolutely no complaints. Love my new bed!
customer_reviews.author: Marnie Coomes

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before selecting this product and I love it! It even came with a pillow. It sleeps well and fits perfectly on my adjustable queen size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I slept great the first time at least
customer_reviews.text: It was a little softer than I expected, but I slept great the first time at least. We'll see how it goes from there.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M Vigil

customer_reviews.title: will give 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: its not that firm. and i did woke up with some amount of pain in my lower back, but maybe that was my first night sleeping on it. I do like the extra pillow though.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjib

customer_reviews.title: Sleep like a king!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new live and sleep Cal king mattress! I wake up feeling well rested, I'm sleeping thru the night and best of all my hips no longer hurt, so I'm pain free. Buy this mattress and sleep like a king.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bivens

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a get away apartment. Have used them for 2 nights and love them
customer_reviews.author: WV Grandma

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to unroll and open up
customer_reviews.text: Received my mattress 2 weeks ago. It was easy to unroll and open up. It immediately started inflating and there was very little odor. I gave it 24 hrs before sleeping on it just to be sure it was all set. It is so comfortable and supportive. Its been great for my back. I absolutely love it and at this point would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great nights sleep!!
customer_reviews.text: While this mattress is firmer than what we’re used to, we both slept soundly all night. It was easy to roll out and It fully inflated. I LOVE THIS MATTRESS.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Mae

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mattress and great price. Put a piece of 1/2 inch plywood on top of metal frame then just set mattress on top and no box springs since we used a platform frame. Super comfy ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: do not buy very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is lumpy and very uncomfortable and give you the worst back pain ever--I wrote to the company and they had no mercy for the problem--I would not recommend this mattress --it's $350 thrown away cause you are stuck with it once it inflates---------DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: We needed a bed sent for elderly friend’s senior apartment. This was easy to ship. Simple to set up and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very comfortable and the price was well below other memory foam mattresses. It is a little longer than the short queen mattress that was in our RV, but doable.
customer_reviews.author: Millie Skinner

customer_reviews.title: You will not be sorry!!  AMAZING comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Leave packed until reaches room temperature, open, let fully expand to size and enjoy! Paid many times as much $ for mattresses in the past that did not last or provide this level of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress for our daughter & son-in-law to use in their camper. They said it was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: I like it just fine. I was hoping it would make my back feel better but it doesn't. It's worth the price for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Made an excellent replacement for my box spring mattress. It is dangerous however, because it is so comfortable, you don't want to get out of it in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Firm and comfortable! Been sleeping on it for 2 weeks now ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely what I was looking for in a mattress ! Firm and comfortable! Been sleeping on it for 2 weeks now and I have to say I love this mattress ! fit perfectly on my new king size bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Broom

customer_reviews.title: Allow at least 48 hours to expand before sleeping on it. 72 hours would be better still.
customer_reviews.text: Received when and exactly as expected. 3 nights sleep so far and it is really an improvement over my old mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mattress for about 10 months now and love it. The quality and comfort are perfect. I love the pillow as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen is here

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is our second one bought. Didnt open totally at corners for weeks BUT eventually filled out.
customer_reviews.author: clay madrona

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE AND GREAT COMFORT!
customer_reviews.text: This was our first mattress in box purchase and we were NOT disappointed! We bought it for our daughter's room and when she was away I would often sneak up to sleep in her bed because of the comfort! Great price, great mattress! We bought a second one for our son!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Sleeps like a cloud!!! I generally don't do reviews but this is a really good mattress! No support when sitting on the edge but just lay down that's what a bed is for and you will see!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: This bed is amazing and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing and well worth the money. It is defiantly medium firm. My husband has back issues and it has helped him a lot!! Going to buy another one for another bed.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: So uncomfortable! Could not move after I slept on it!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

product_meta.title: Live and Sleep Resort Classic Queen Memory Foam Mattress - 12-Inch - Cool Bed in a Box - Medium Plush Firmness, Advanced Support, Bonus Luxury Form Pillow - Low VOC CertiPUR Certified - Queen Size
feature_bullets: PERFECT CONTOUR. Our Queen size mattress cradles you in a deluxe cushion of 3” Premium visco memory foam on top of 3" Air-Flow Infused convoluted foam over a layer of High Density Support Base. Extra-thick profile brings luxury hotel touch
COOLER INNOVATION. Breathable, plush & better quality materials, not cheap inexpensive foam. Optimum comfort that relaxes & cools your body. Deep rest for a long day ahead. No coils or latex used

BEST BUY SOLUTION. Top Rated Queen Memory Foam Mattress with over 90% 5-star reviews on Amazon. Classic medium-firm HD core relieves pressure points + less tossing & turning. Good for side, back and stomach sleepers. Signature feel recharges you from a dream night of ultimate slumber

SOFT FABRIC COVER. Flex linen works on any home bedroom furniture bedframe set, box-spring or futon. Stays comfortable and has a cloud like sensation. Use a bedding pad or protector on any mattress, cot, tri-fold or guest room bed

CERTIPUR-US CERTIFIED & BONUS free memory foam pillow. Non toxic, Eco-Friendly & Hypoallergenic + Great on a boxspring, platform, adjustable or hard floor only. New purchase includes full refund guarantee from 30 day trial + 20-year warranty
